title: Understanding Trendlines
text: Trendlines are used to show patterns or trends in data over time or to examine the relationship between two variables. They are typically added to charts that display data points in a series.

title: Types of Charts
text: Consider the types of charts that are used to display relationships between variables. These charts often have axes that represent different variables.

title: Identifying Non-Applicable Charts
text: Which types of charts do not typically display relationships between two variables?
